trans-unit.source: Implement and attach to a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter"></xref> object to control how the importer maps Web Services Description Language (WSDL) parts to those of a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Implementar e ligue a um <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter"> </xref> partes de objeto para controlar a forma como o importador de maps Web Services Description Language (WSDL) de um <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Implement the IWsdlImportExtension interface to control the mapping between WSDL and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> objects, especially when reading custom WSDL extensions to modify your contract or endpoint information.
trans-unit.target: Implementa a interface IWsdlImportExtension para controlar o mapeamento entre WSDL e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>objetos, especialmente quando ler extensões WSDL personalizadas para modificar as suas informações de contrato ou o ponto final.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: Then attach your custom IWsdlImportExtension object to a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter> either programmatically or by using an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, anexe o objeto IWsdlImportExtension personalizado para um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter>programaticamente ou utilizando um ficheiro de configuração de aplicação.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter>

trans-unit.source: You can also attach your custom IWsdlImportExtension object to the internal <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter> used by the [ServiceModel Metadata Utility Tool (Svcutil.exe)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) using an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Também pode anexar o objeto IWsdlImportExtension personalizado à interna <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter>utilizado pelo [ServiceModel metadados utilitário de ferramenta (Svcutil.exe)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) utilizando um ficheiro de configuração de aplicação.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A> method is called to import a contract.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A>método é denominado para importar um contrato.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.BeforeImport%2A> method to modify the metadata that is then imported into <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> objects.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.BeforeImport%2A>método para modificar os metadados que é então importado para <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>objetos.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.BeforeImport%2A>

trans-unit.source: Called prior to importing metadata documents.
trans-unit.target: Chamado antes de importar os metadados documentos.

trans-unit.source: The BeforeImport methods of all registered <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension> objects is called before anything is imported from the supplied metadata.
trans-unit.target: Os métodos de BeforeImport de todas as registadas <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension>objetos denomina-se antes de nada foi importado de metadados fornecido.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension>

trans-unit.source: The service descriptions to modify.
trans-unit.target: As descrições de serviço para modificar.

trans-unit.source: The schema collection to be used when importing.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de esquema a utilizar ao importar.

trans-unit.source: The policy assertions used when importing.
trans-unit.target: As asserções de política utilizadas quando a importação.

trans-unit.source: Called when importing a contract.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando a importação de um contrato.

trans-unit.source: The ImportContract method is called when a contract is being imported.
trans-unit.target: O método ImportContract é chamado quando um contrato que está a ser importado.

trans-unit.source: You can modify the contract or insert other exporting behaviors such as <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=fullName> and an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=fullName> objects to modify the code that is generated for the contract.
trans-unit.target: Pode modificar o contrato ou inserir noutros comportamentos exportar como <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=fullName>e um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=fullName>objetos para modificar o código que é gerado para o contrato.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The importer.
trans-unit.target: O importador.

trans-unit.source: The import context to be modified.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de importação para ser modificado.

trans-unit.source: Called when importing an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando a importação de um ponto final.

trans-unit.source: The ImportEndpoint method is called when importing an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: O método ImportEndpoint é chamado quando a importação de um ponto final.

trans-unit.source: Modify the context properties to customize the imported endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Modificar as propriedades de contexto para personalizar o ponto final importado.

trans-unit.source: The importer.
trans-unit.target: O importador.

trans-unit.source: The import context to modify.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de importação para modificar.
